title: Mun Paniya Lyrics Nandha
stanzas:
Mun paniya mudhal mazhaiya
en manadhil yedho vilugiradhe
vilugiradhe uyir nenaigiradhe
ho oh..

puriyaadha uravil nindren
ariyaadha sugangal kandaen
maattram thandhaval
neethaane.

Mun paniya mudhal mazhaiya
en manadhil yedho vilugiradhe
vilugiradhe uyir nenaigiradhe

manasil yedhay maraikkum kiliye
manasa thorandhu solladi veliye
kalaya kadandhu nee
vandhadhu edharkku
kannukuulle oru
ragasiyam irukku
manasa thorandhu solladi veliye

un vizhiyinil
un vizhiyinil
adhanai ippodhu
kandu pudithu vitten

idhu vara enakillai
mugavarigal
adhai naan kandaen
un punnagaiyil
vazhgiren naan
un moochile..

Mun paniya mudhal mazhaiya
en manadhil yedho vilugiradhe
vilugiradhe uyir nenaigiradhe
ho oh..

salanga kulunga alaiye
sangadhi enna solladi
veliye
karayil vandhu nee
thulluvadherkku
nelappa pudichikka
nenappadhu edharkku
elo elo yelo elo...

en padhaigal
en padhaigal
unadhu vali paathu
vandhu mudiyudhadi

iravayum pagalyum
maattri vittaai
enakkul unnai nee
oottrivittaai
moolginen naan
un kannilae..

Mun paniya mudhal mazhaiya
en manadhil yedho vilugiradhe
vilugiradhe uyir nenaigiradhe
ho oh..

seo.title: Mun Paniya Lyrics Nandha
seo.description: Get the complete Mun Paniya Lyrics Nandha from Nandha. Read the lyrics penned by Pazhani Bharathi and composed by Yuvan and sung by Malgudi Subha. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pazhani Bharathi, Nandha, Yuvan, Malgudi Subha, SPB, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
